h3_title: Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide
content: Expect her to get more aggressive in this second half, expelling more lightning at the end of some of her close-combat attacks that require more dodging and less room for counters. You can still use Immobilize to keep her from floating away, however.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Star.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Star', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Star' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Star Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Expect her to get more aggressive in this second half, expelling more lightning at the end of some of her close-combat attacks that require more dodging and less room for counters. You can still use Immobilize to keep her from floating away, however.
